bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim and the Religious Transformation of Lower Nubia in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Religious transformation in Lower Nubia in the fourth and fifth centuries. - 3. The sixth-century missions to Nubia placed in context. - 4. Qasr Ibrim as a case study of religious transformation.

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: Jitse H.F. Dijkstra, Qasr Ibrim and the Religious Transformation of Lower Nubia in Late Antiquity.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 111-122, 2 figg.

1. Introduction. - 2. Religious transformation in Lower Nubia in the fourth and fifth centuries. - 3. The sixth-century missions to Nubia placed in context. - 4. Qasr Ibrim as a case study of religious transformation.
